email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of October 15-20. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. I can offer a starting freight rate in the low 50s (USD 50.50 per ton). Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than our budget. Could you consider something in the high 40s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thanks for your feedback. I understand your budget constraints. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of USD 49.75 per ton. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for the revised offer. The rate is more acceptable, but could we push the laycan to October 16-21? Also, can we cap the demurrage at 3 days? Let me know if these adjustments are possible. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to October 16-21. However, the demurrage cap is non-negotiable at 5 days. The rest of the terms remain as discussed. Let me know if this works for you, and I’ll draft the charter party. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for the flexibility on the laycan. We can accept the demurrage terms as proposed. Please proceed with drafting the charter party at USD 49.75 per ton. Looking forward to the final details. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, Great news! I’ll proceed with drafting the charter party and will send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for the smooth negotiation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
